name: svelte-scaffold-eth-monorepo
description: A modern starter template for building Ethereum dApps with SvelteKit 5, Foundry, and DaisyUI

scripts.build: pnpm -C foundry build && pnpm -C web build
scripts.generate: pnpm -C agent generate && pnpm -C web generate
scripts.test: pnpm test:contracts && pnpm test:web && pnpm test:agent
scripts.test:web: pnpm chain && pnpm deploy:anvil && pnpm -C web test
scripts.format: pnpm -C foundry format && pnpm -C web format
scripts.lint: pnpm -C foundry lint && pnpm -C web lint
scripts.clean: pnpm -C foundry clean && rm -rf web/.svelte-kit web/build
